verses.verse: It happened in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H569>Amraphel,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar,<s%> <S%H746>Arioch,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H495>Ellasar,<s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and <S%H8413>Tidal,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1471>Goiim,<s%>

that they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H1298>Bera,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and with <S%H1306>Birsha,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> <S%H8134>Shinab,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H126>Admah,<s%> and <S%H8038>Shemeber,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6636>Zeboiim,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%> (the same <S%H1931>is<s%> <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>).
All these joined <S%H2266>together<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim<s%> (the <S%H1931>same<s%> is the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%>).
<S%H6240>Twelve<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> they <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer,<s%> and in the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> they <S%H4775>rebelled.<s%>

In the <S%H6240>fourteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> who were with <S%H5221>him,<s%> and struck the <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%> in Ashteroth <S%H6255>Karnaim,<s%> and the <S%H2104>Zuzim<s%> in <S%H1990>Ham,<s%> and the <S%H368>Emim<s%> in Shaveh <S%H7741>Kiriathaim,<s%>
and the <S%H2752>Horites<s%> in their <S%H2042>Mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> to <S%H364>Elparan,<s%> which is <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

They <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> En <S%H5880>Mishpat<s%> (the same is <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>), and <S%H5221>struck<s%> all the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H6003>Amalekites,<s%> and also the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> that <S%H3427>lived<s%> in Hazazon <S%H2688>Tamar.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H126>Admah,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6636>Zeboiim,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%> (the <S%H1931>same<s%> is <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>) went <S%H3318>out;<s%> and they <S%H6186>set<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in array against them in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim;<s%>

against <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and <S%H8413>Tidal<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1471>Goiim,<s%> and <S%H569>Amraphel<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar,<s%> and <S%H746>Arioch<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H495>Ellasar;<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> against the <S%H2568>five.<s%>

Now the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7708>Siddim<s%> was full <S%H875>of<s%> tar <S%H875>pits;<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H7604>there,<s%> and those who remained <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H2022>hills.<s%>
They <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H7399>goods<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> and all their <S%H400>food,<s%> and went their <S%H3212>way.<s%>

They <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and his <S%H7399>goods,<s%> and <S%H3212>departed.<s%>

One who had <S%H6412>escaped<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> the <S%H5680>Hebrew.<s%> Now he <S%H7931>lived<s%> by the <S%H436>oaks<s%> of <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H6063>Aner;<s%> and these were <S%H1167>allies<s%> of <S%H87>Abram.<s%>

When <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that his <S%H251>relative<s%> was taken <S%H7617>captive,<s%> he <S%H7324>led<s%> out his <S%H2593>trained<s%> <S%H3211>men,<s%> born in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6240>eighteen,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> as far as <S%H1835>Dan.<s%>

He <S%H2505>divided<s%> himself against them by <S%H3915>night,<s%> he and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H7291>them,<s%> and pursued them to <S%H2327>Hobah,<s%> which is on the left <S%H8040>hand<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus.<s%>

He brought <S%H7725>back<s%> all the <S%H7399>goods,<s%> and also brought <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H251>relative,<s%> <S%H3876>Lot,<s%> and his <S%H7399>goods,<s%> and the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H5971>also,<s%> and the people.

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H310>him,<s%> after his <S%H7725>return<s%> from the <S%H5221>slaughter<s%> of <S%H3540>Chedorlaomer<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> who were with <S%H6010>him,<s%> at the valley of <S%H7740>Shaveh<s%> <S%H1931>(that<s%> <S%H4428>is,<s%> the King's <S%H6010>Valley<s%>).

<S%H4442>Melchizedek<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8004>Salem<s%> brought <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3196>wine:<s%> and he was <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> Most <S%H5945>High.<s%>

He <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be <S%H87>Abram<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> Most <S%H5945>High,<s%> <S%H7069>possessor<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth:<s%>

and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be <S%H410>God<s%> Most <S%H5945>High,<s%> who has <S%H4042>delivered<s%> your <S%H6862>enemies<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>" Abram <S%H5414>gave<s%> him a tenth of <S%H4643>all.<s%>
The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H5414>"Give<s%> me the <S%H5315>people,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> the goods to <S%H7399>yourself.<s%>"

<S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> "I have lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> Most <S%H5945>High,<s%> <S%H7069>possessor<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth,<s%>

that I will <S%H518>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H2339>thread<s%> nor a sandal <S%H5275>strap<s%> nor anything that is <S%H559>yours,<s%> lest you should say, <S%H6238><s%> 'I have made <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H6238>rich.<s%>'

I will accept nothing from you <S%H1107>except<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> the young <S%H582>men<s%> have <S%H398>eaten,<s%> and the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> who <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H6063>me:<s%> Aner, <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and <S%H4471>Mamre.<s%> Let <S%H1992>them<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H2506>portion.<s%>"
